org.osgeo.mapguide

Class MgTileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgObject

        • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgGuardDisposable
          • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgService
            • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgTileService

  • public class MgTileService
extends MgService
    This class provides services to render a map into an image

      • getTile

        public MgByteReader getTile(MgMap map,
                            java.lang.String baseMapLayerGroupName,
                            int tileColumn,
                            int tileRow)
        Returns the specified base map tile for the given map. If a cached tile image exists it will return it, otherwise the tile is rendered and added to the cache.
        Parameters:
        map - Input Map object containing current state of map.
        baseMapLayerGroupName - Input Specifies the name of the baseMapLayerGroup for which to render the tile.
        tileColumn - Input Specifies the column index of the tile to return.
        tileRow - Input Specifies the row index of the tile to return.
        Returns:
        A byte reader containing the rendered tile image.

      • getTile

        public MgByteReader getTile(MgResourceIdentifier resource,
                            java.lang.String baseMapLayerGroupName,
                            int tileColumn,
                            int tileRow,
                            int scaleIndex)
        Returns the specified base map tile for the given map or tile set. If a cached tile image exists it will return it, otherwise the tile is rendered and added to the cache.
        Parameters:
        resource - Input Resource identifier for the map definition or Tile Set Definition
        baseMapLayerGroupName - Input Specifies the name of the baseMapLayerGroup for which to render the tile.
        tileColumn - Input Specifies the column index of the tile to return.
        tileRow - Input Specifies the row index of the tile to return.
        scaleIndex - Input Scale index to render. Most detailed scale is index 0.
        Returns:
        A byte reader containing the rendered tile image.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache(MgMap map)
        Clears the entire tile cache for the given map. Tiles for all base map layer groups and finite scales will be removed.
        Parameters:
        map - Input Specifies the map whose tile cache will be cleared.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache(MgResourceIdentifier tileSet)
        Clears the entire tile cache for the given tile set. Tiles for all base map layer groups and finite scales will be removed.
        Parameters:
        map - Input Specifies the map whose tile cache will be cleared.
        Since:
        3.0

      • getDefaultTileSizeX

        public int getDefaultTileSizeX()
        Returns the default width of a tile.
        Returns:
        Default width of a tile in pixels.
        Since:
        1.2

        Returns the default width of a tile.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Since:

      • getTileProviders

        public MgByteReader getTileProviders()
        Returns the XML description of available tile providers, along with supported connection parameters. This provides sufficient information for client applications to build rich editor user interfaces for editing Tile Set Definitions
        Returns:
        The XML description of available tile providers
        Since:
        3.0
